description: Detects usage of 7zip utilities (7z.exe, 7za.exe and 7zr.exe) to extract password protected zip files.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Legitimate activity is expected since extracting files with a password can be common in some environement.
name: Password Protected Compressed File Extraction Via 7Zip
query: (((winlog.event_data.Description:*7\-Zip*) OR (process.executable.text:("*\\7z.exe" OR "*\\7zr.exe" OR "*\\7za.exe")) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("7z.exe" OR "7za.exe"))) AND (process.command_line.text:"*\ \-p*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ x\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-o*"))
